hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path to #Morpha#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: Did you know that you can access the Fire Temple boss door without dropping the pillar by using the Hover boots?

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Magic Meter#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Wallet# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that @ deserves a hug. Everyone does!
